item.text: From Paul, an apostle (not from men, nor by human agency, but by Jesus Christ and God the Father who raised him from the dead)

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, to the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> of <st data-num="1053" class="">Galatia</st>.

<st data-num="5485" class="">Grace</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,

who <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="3704">to</st> <st data-num="1807" class="">rescue</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> this <st data-num="1764" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>,
to whom be glory forever and ever! Amen.
I am astonished that you are so quickly deserting the one who called you by the grace of Christ and are following a different gospel—

<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> there really <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> gospel,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487 3361">but</st><n id="2" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5015" class="">disturbing</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wanting</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3344" class="">distort</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> (<st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven)</st> should <st data-num="2097" class="">preach<n id="1" /> a gospel</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">contrary</st> to the <st data-num="3739">one</st> we <st data-num="2097" class="">preached</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="2" /> let him <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="331">condemned to hell</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5613" class="">As</st> we have <st data-num="4280">said before</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> any <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> is <st data-num="2097" class="">preaching</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="2097" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">contrary</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="3880" class="">received</st>, let him <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="331">condemned to hell</st>!<n id="1" />
Am I now trying to gain the approval of people, or of God? Or am I trying to please people? If I were still trying to please people, I would not be a slave of Christ!
Now I want you to know, brothers and sisters, that the gospel I preached is not of human origin.
For I did not receive it or learn it from any human source; instead I received it by a revelation of Jesus Christ.
For you have heard of my former way of life in Judaism, how I was savagely persecuting the church of God and trying to destroy it.

I<n id="1" /> was <st data-num="4298" class="">advancing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2454" class="">Judaism</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">beyond</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4915" class="">contemporaries</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">nation</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="5225" class="">was</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4056" class="">extremely</st> <st data-num="2207" class="">zealous</st> for the <st data-num="3862" class="">traditions</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3967" class="">ancestors</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the one<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="873" class="">set</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="873" class="">apart</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">birth</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> was <st data-num="2106" class="">pleased</st>

to <st data-num="601" class="">reveal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I could <st data-num="2097" class="">preach</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>, I did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> go to <st data-num="4323">ask advice</st> from<n id="3" /> any <st data-num="4561 129">human being</st>,<n id="4" />
nor did I go up to Jerusalem to see those who were apostles before me, but right away I departed to Arabia, and then returned to Damascus.
Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to visit Cephas and get information from him, and I stayed with him fifteen days.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">none</st> of the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>.

I <st data-num="3756 5574">assure</st> you<n id="1" /> that, <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5574" class="">lying</st> about <st data-num="3739">what</st> I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1899" class="">Afterward</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2824" class="">regions</st> of <st data-num="4947" class="">Syria</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2791" class="">Cilicia</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4383">personally</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="50" class="">unknown</st> to the <st data-num="1577" class="">churches</st> of <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="3588">that</st> are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

They <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hearing</st>, “The one who <st data-num="4218" class="">once</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> is <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="2097">proclaiming the good news</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> he <st data-num="4218" class="">once</st> tried to <st data-num="4199" class="">destroy</st>.”
So they glorified God because of me.
